title: Minecraft Live 2021: Vote for the copper golem!
author: Minecraft
description: The copper golem is built out of copper. But by whom? By you! Just like all other copper structures, it oxidizes over time and it also enjoys randomly pushing copper buttons. Vote for the copper golem during Minecraft Live on October 16 at noon EDT!

localize.title: マインクラフトライブ2021 銅製ゴーレムに投票しよう
